issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.summary: in FsShell, UGI params should be overidden through env vars(-D arg)

Overall the patch looks good.
Just one minor nit.
TestFsShellList.java:
Instead of hardcoding value {{hadoop.security.authentication}}, use {{CommonConfigurationKeysPublic.HADOOP_SECURITY_AUTHENTICATION}}

* needs version, component etc in the JIRA attributes
* someone who understands UGI needs to be found to review this

core need LGTM though

[~shahrs87] and [~stevel@apache.org] thanks for taking look.

bq.Instead of hardcoding value hadoop.security.authentication, use CommonConfigurationKeysPublic.HADOOP_SECURITY_AUTHENTICATION
Sure, will update patch once after daryn reviews.
bq.needs version, component etc in the JIRA attributes
Ok
bq.someone who understands UGI needs to be found to review this
Sure,Will wait
[~daryn] can you please take a look? thanks.
{color:#333333}*+1*{color}, Using the configuration with overlay values *(keys set using -D args)* to initialize the UGI will be really helpful.
[~vinayrpet] thanks for review..Uploaded patch to use CommonConfigurationKeysPublic.HADOOP_SECURITY_AUTHENTICATION to address [~shahrs87] comment.
